text: Hi please help me creating a time field in contact property, which is able to work like datetime property and show time according to viewer's(admin) time zone accorgingly. Thanks
So how it goes? Were you able to convince them to stay?
Does webflow have a cli to pull files locally and save in GitHub?
Having the ability to backup files should be a big deal for a business to own the work and somewhat easy to migrate if needed.
for HubSpot this is possible by using a service like <https://skyvia.com/>
I was wondering if webflow does because that could be a big reason to stay with HubSpot. You can have a backup of your core files that you own.
Ah, okay. Not sure about webflow
Datetime fields can only be created through the api and even after you create them they won't show the time in the crm pages

Hello! I've been reading over HubSpot's docs but I can't seem to find a straight forward answer. I'm trying to use an api call to extract object data to a gzip csv format in order to send it to s3. Can someone confirm this is possible? And let me know which native api to use?
